Html:
I'm using the  test file 11documentsecurity.php and the file it generates has no password protection when opened with openoffice 3.2

I'm able to open and edit the file however I want. Am I missing something ?

Protection of .xls files with passwords will be supported in OOo 3.3:
http://www.openoffice.org/issues/buglist.cgi?issue_id=105076+109634+109779+109976+110383
